short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EVOLV helps Marketers stay updated, relevant, & effective, using AI-powered marketing news, feeds, tools, & resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay at the forefront of the industry with EVOLV - Your premier source for the latest Marketing News, insights, and trends, directly on your New Tab page!

EVOLV delivers personalized daily Marketing News and insights tailored to your professional growth and goals, keeping you informed and ahead in your career.

Elevate your expertise and remain a sought-after professional with EVOLV's handpicked marketing content feeds, tools, and resources, powered by our advanced AI. Use EVOLV to enhance your knowledge and edge closer to that top 1% in the marketing sphere every single day!

In the fast-evolving world of marketing, EVOLV is your ally to keep abreast of the rapid changes.

For optimal performance, EVOLV requires certain permissions:

Access to api.goevolv.io: Essential for retrieving the latest Marketing News feeds and content.
Access to suggestqueries.google.com: Necessary for generating keyword recommendations in the new tab search bar.
New Tab page modification: EVOLV transforms your New Tab page to enrich its features and utility for a superior user experience.
Icon fetching: To customize your new tab links with dynamic icons.
Retrieval of frequently visited websites: To create a bespoke links grid on your new tab page, enhancing your daily browsing with personalized shortcuts.
